altername_name: Hissatsu Pachinko Station Classic 2 - Tsui ni yomigaeru!! Bakuretsu Meiki Fukkatsu
name: Hissatsu Pachinko Station - Classic 2
overview: Hissatsu Pachinko Station Classic - Fukkatsu! Natsukashi no Meiki-tachi features 3 different pachinko machines (Rhapsody, Pop Culture & Driving Punch) with different levels of zooms. The game also got a story mode in which the player takes the role of a pachinko gambler and he can go around the town playing in 3 different pachinko places and try to win prices.
